Class FlashcardPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
view.FlashcardPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class FlashcardPane extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
A view which shows user flashcards.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.2
Author:
Max, MaxHarrisMJH@gmail.com

  • Method Details

    • setupFlashcards

      public void setupFlashcards()
      Sets up the main add flashcard button which allows users to create a new flashcard.

    • updateFlashcard

      public void updateFlashcard​(String oldFlashcardTitle, String newFlashcardTitle)
      Updates a flashcard's title by passing an existing flashcard title as well as the new flashcard title.
      Parameters:
      oldFlashcardTitle - Title of flashcard that the user wants to replace.
      newFlashcardTitle - Title in which the flashcard will replace.

    • removeFlashcard

      public void removeFlashcard​(String flashcardTitle)
      Removes a flashcard by specifying an existing title.
      Parameters:
      flashcardTitle - Title of flashcard to be deleted.

    • clearFlashcards

      public void clearFlashcards()
      Clears all flashcards (Button) from the view.

    • addButton

      public void addButton​(String title)
      Adds a flashcard (Button) to the view.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the flashcard.

    • isFlowPaneEmpty

      public boolean isFlowPaneEmpty()
      Checks to see if the view (FlowPane) has any children / nodes.
      Returns:
      true if there are nodes in the FlowPane, false otherwise.

    • hideAll

      public void hideAll()
      Hides all Buttons.

    • showAll

      public void showAll()
      Shows all Buttons.
